messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Family Learning Exchange
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m almost positive that Janie died, perhaps last year? I m thinking it was very sudden. Joyce
messages.messageBody:
on 2/16/03 3:33 PM, Rachel Ann at hindar@... wrote:

> Does anyone know if the family learning exchange is still in existence? I
> loved their magazines, and I loved the ideas I got from them. They were the
> first ones to truly help me understand natural learning.
> I forgot about them till today when I was cleaning out my attic (see other
> post).
>
> I tried to get to their site but keep getting a computer error. Are they
> long gone?

I'm almost positive that Janie died, perhaps last year? I'm thinking it was
very sudden.

Joyce

messages.messageBody:
Does anyone know if the family learning exchange is still in existence? I
loved their magazines, and I loved the ideas I got from them. They were the
first ones to truly help me understand natural learning.
I forgot about them till today when I was cleaning out my attic (see other
post).

I tried to get to their site but keep getting a computer error. Are they
long gone?

be well,
Rachel Ann






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
